content: @pnkfelix wanted to get in touch with you meanwhile we prepare the agenda to see if we want to have wg checkins at the beginning kind of part as announcements or if we want to keep them at the end
one thing I'd definitely start asking for is to fill checkins in the agenda so you just copy and paste
and there's no back and forth meanwhile you ping people and they paste the checkin
yeah I just moved them to the front (or rather, end of the ## Announcements) on today's agenda.
